channel.title: Bugfixes on Andi Altendorfer

item.title: EMIE System 1.0 - Bugfix Lebensraeume
item.description:
ematrix | emie | bugfixes | Lebensraeume

Oct. 9th 2025

Bettina tries to assign team-courses but nothing happend.

root cause

I need to copy the database and debug the error locally. The newly implemented ActiveRange returns nil but the code expected []. So, if a Person doesn’t have Ranges, nothing was selected. In instances without HR-Import, we don’t have Ranges and so, the default sould be true for nil and [].

Actions

Bug fixed, image buildt, Lebensraeume.kportal.io updated.
